artist: Artist: Cristy C. Road , et al.; Author: Joe Biel , et al.; Printer: Eberhardt Press, Portland; Publisher: Microcosm Publishing, Bloomington, Ind.
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, letterpress and photomechanical illustration of a living room set, featuring bike tours, beer cans, and a tv, printed in color offset lithography on coated paper covers; 40 pp.
medium: Color and black-and-white offset lithography, letterpress; bound volume
title: You Can Work Any Hundred Hours A Week You Want (In Your Underwear)!!: The History of Microcosm Publishing As Told to the Best of My Recollection
